Room.Name: Skies Over Brownhaven
Room.ShortDescription: You are atop a copper dragon in the air over Brownhaven. 50.0.0.0.0
Room.LongDescription: Not far below you is the dragon pits near the western edge of the village of Brownhaven. In the distance to the west, you can see the Nartiz mountain Range. To the north is Mount Aphinix, home of the mountain trolls. Looking east, you see the Kista Forest.
